attributes.action: scrap this e-petitions web site as it is a drain on the economy and doesn't do any good.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seems that all the petitions on this site are just there for people to vent their frustrations at the government not doing anything about things that matter to them. As far as I am aware, none of the petitions on these pages have ever had any effect on the way things are, therefore the meaning of petition on this site is a joke. It must be draining resources that could be used on something more useful like creating a decent national health service, or policing illegal immigrants.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
